title: Corruption in Park Construction in Biratnagar
description:
On July 8, 2022, the Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) filed a corruption case against nine individuals, including Indira Karki, the former Deputy Mayor of Biratnagar Metropolitan City, and Ekdev Adhikari, the then Chief Administrative Officer. The case concerned alleged corruption in the construction of a park and pond steps in Ward-15 of Biratnagar.

The accused were charged with embezzling state funds amounting to NPR 1,055,979.48 by creating false documents to claim payments for work that was either incomplete or overvalued. The CIAA's investigation alleged that:

  • Engineers created a measurement book that falsely inflated the amount of work completed.
  • The Chief Administrative Officer approved the fraudulent measurement book without on-site verification.
  • The user committee used these false documents to claim payment.
  • The user committee also violated regulations by using heavy machinery (an excavator) for a project intended to be carried out with local labor.

The case was filed at the Special Court in Kathmandu under Section 8 of the Prevention of Corruption Act, 2002. However, on November 9, 2023, a bench of the Special Court delivered a final verdict, acquitting all nine accused individuals of all corruption charges.
unverified_info: The alleged irregularities and corrupt activities related to the park construction project occurred around the year 2020. However, the precise start and end dates of the construction project itself are not specified in the available source documents.
key_allegations: Embezzlement of state funds totaling NPR 1,055,979.48
Creation of false documentation (measurement book) to overstate completed work
Approval of payments for incomplete and overvalued construction work without proper verification
Collusion between public officials and a consumer committee to misappropriate funds
Violation of regulations by using heavy machinery instead of local labor
related_entities: Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA)

timeline.title: CIAA Files Corruption Case
timeline.description: The Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) filed a corruption case at the Special Court, Kathmandu, against nine individuals, including the former Deputy Mayor of Biratnagar, Indira Karki, and then Chief Administrative Officer, Ekdev Adhikari.

timeline.title: Special Court Acquits All Accused
timeline.description: The Special Court in Kathmandu acquitted all nine individuals accused in the park construction corruption case, citing a lack of evidence to support the CIAA's charges.
